installer.title: Floorp 安裝程式
installer.description: 安裝 Floorp 瀏覽器，開啟一份注重隱私、快速且可自由客製化的瀏覽體驗。
installer.adminRightsEnabled: 為所有具有管理權限的使用者安裝。
installer.customPathRequired: 自訂安裝路徑需要管理員權限。

exitConfirmation.title: 要取消安裝嗎？
exitConfirmation.message: 取消安裝程序意味著將會取消安裝 Floorp。

complete.launchCheckbox: 安裝後啟動 Floorp 瀏覽器
complete.countdownMessage: 安裝程式會在 {{count}} 秒後關閉

privacy.title: 隱私保護
privacy.description: Floorp 是以使用者的隱私安全為優先而設計的。使用防追蹤功能和安全瀏覽模式保護您的線上隱私。

performance.title: 效能高速
performance.description: 從網頁載入到分頁切換，搭載最佳化引擎，實現更順暢的瀏覽體驗。

customization.title: 豐富的客製化功能
customization.description: Floorp 提供豐富的客製化選項。從使用者介面到功能，您都可以依喜好客製化。

extensions.title: 擴充技能
extensions.description: 與 Firefox 擴充套件相容，可讓您將喜愛的工具和服務新增至瀏覽器。

multiplatform.title: 多平台支援
multiplatform.description: 支援各種平台，包括 Windows、macOS 和 Linux。在任何地方都能享受相同的體驗。

success.downloaded_dev_mode: 已下載 Floorp 安裝程式 (開發模式)

errors.signature_verification_failed: Installer signature verification failed. Execution aborted for security reasons.
errors.signature_verification_error: An error occurred during signature verification: {{0}}
errors.installer_execution: An error occurred while running the installer: {{0}}
errors.browser_not_found: Floorp browser not found. Installation was successful, but the browser executable could not be found.
errors.admin_rights_denied: Administrator rights were denied. You selected the administrator rights mode, but permission was denied.
errors.exit_code_not_found: Could not get the installer's exit code. Administrator rights may have been denied.
errors.admin_install_failed: Installation with administrator rights failed. Exit code: {{0}}
errors.user_installer_launch: Failed to launch installer process with user rights: {{0}}
errors.user_installer_execution: An issue occurred while running the installer with user rights: {{0}}
